member.name: T:Xenko.Core.IO.NamespaceDoc
member.summary:
The namespace contains additional types for reading and writing to streams, and types that provide directory and path support. It also provides a layer that abstracts file accesses and paths of local disks, network, databases, etc.
The class allows stream reading to and writing from unmanaged data using an native pointer.
The class allows manipulation of paths and provides various operation such as absolute/relative path conversion, normalization, etc.

member.name: T:Xenko.Core.IO.StreamFlags
member.summary: Describes the different type of streams.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.StreamFlags.None
member.summary: Returns the default underlying stream without any alterations. Can be a seek-able stream or not depending on the file.

member.summary: A stream in which we can seek

member.name: T:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileAccess
member.summary: File access equivalent of .

member.summary: Write access.

member.summary: Read/Write Access,

member.name: T:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode
member.summary: File mode equivalent of .

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.CreateNew
member.summary: Creates a new file. The function fails if a specified file exists.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.Create
member.summary: Creates a new file, always. If a file exists, the function overwrites the file, clears the existing attributes, combines the specified file attributes, and flags with FILE_ATTRIBUTE_ARCHIVE, but does not set the security descriptor that the SECURITY_ATTRIBUTES structure specifies.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.Open
member.summary: Opens a file. The function fails if the file does not exist.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.OpenOrCreate
member.summary: Opens a file, always. If a file does not exist, the function creates a file as if dwCreationDisposition is CREATE_NEW.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.Truncate
member.summary: Opens a file and truncates it so that its size is 0 (zero) bytes. The function fails if the file does not exist. The calling process must open the file with the GENERIC_WRITE access right.

member.name: F:Xenko.Core.IO.VirtualFileMode.Append
member.summary: Opens a file if it exists and go at the end, otherwise creates a new file.

member.name: T:Xenko.XenkoVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Xenko version.
member.remarks: Note: Xenko.xkpkg and PublicVersion versions should match. Also, during package build, PackageUpdateVersionTask is updating that file and expect some specific text regex so be careful if you change any of this.

member.summary: The version used by editor for display purpose. 4th digit needs to be at least 1 if used (due to NuGet special cases).

member.summary: The informational assembly version, containing -dev or -g[git_hash] during package.

member.name: M:System.IO.Compression.Zip.ZipFile.DateTimeToDosTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: DOS Date and time are packed values with the following format: MS-DOS date bits description: 0-4 Day of the month (1�E1) 5-8 Month (1 = January, 2 = February, and so on) 9-15 Year offset from 1980 (add 1980 to get actual year) MS-DOS time bits description: 0-4 Second divided by 2 5-10 Minute (0�E9) 11-15 Hour (0�E3 on a 24-hour clock)
member.returns: The date time to dos time.

member.returns: True if the zip is valid, otherwise False.
